xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: Conso Note : n nFor this XBRL filing, we have tagged numbers as below in line our annual reporting practice. n n1)tTrade Receivables & Other Financial Assets : Clubbed under the head “Adjustments for decrease (increase) in trade receivables, current” n2)tOther Current & Non-Current Assets : Clubbed under the head “Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets” n3)tOther Current & Non-Current Liabilities : Clubbed under the head “Adjustments for increase (decrease) in other current liabilities” n4)tTrade Payables, Other Financial Liabilities & Provisions : Clubbed under the head “Adjustments for increase (decrease) in trade payables, current” n5)tCapital Expenditure on Property, Plant & Equipments, Intangible Assets and Investment Properties (after adjustment of increase / decrease of Capital Work-in-Progress and Capital Advances) : Clubbed under the head “Purchase of property, plant and equipment” n6)tWithdrawal / (Investments) in Other Bank Deposits (net) : Clubbed under the head “Other inflows (outflows) of cash in Investing Activity” n7)tSale / (Purchase) of Current Investments (net) : Clubbed under the head “Other inflows (outflows) of cash in Investing Activity” n8)tTransaction with Non-Controlling Interests : Clubbed under the head “Other inflows (outflows) of cash in Financing Activity” n9)tExchange Difference arising on conversion taken to Foreign Currency Translation Reserve : Clubbed under the head “Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents”
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfOtherExpenses: Foreign exchange loss / (gain)n (other than those considered as Finance Costs)
Foreign exchange loss / (gain)n (other than those considered as Finance Costs)
